trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event lets you customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in the details view.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>eventos permite-lhe personalizar (ou desenhados) o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo na vista de detalhes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `true` e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the header.
trans-unit.target: DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs transmitido para o processador de eventos contém informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>para desenhar e também fornece métodos para o ajudar a desenhar o cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A> property to retrieve information about the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>propriedade para obter informações sobre o cabeçalho de coluna para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade para fazer o desenho real na área de especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementos que não precisam de personalização, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>propriedade quando pretender que o sistema operativo para desenhar o subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to customize only specific headers.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando pretender personalizar apenas cabeçalhos específicos.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para evitar problemas com gráficos flickering quando o proprietário de desenho, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta funcionalidade só está disponível no Windows XP e família Windows Server 2003 quando a aplicação chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the header's column within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna do cabeçalho dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the header.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> used for the header text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> utilizado para o texto do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de fundo do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the background color of the header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de fundo do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e localização do cabeçalho da coluna para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A localização especificada por esta propriedade é relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do cabeçalho da coluna dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a imagem de fundo do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the standard background for the column header.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para desenhar o em segundo plano padrão para o cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column header should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o cabeçalho de coluna deve ser desenhado pelo sistema operativo em vez de proprietário-desenhada.

trans-unit.source: Use this property when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName> event for headers that you do not want to customize.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade quando o processamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>eventos para os cabeçalhos que não pretende personalizar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, the header will be drawn as usual.
trans-unit.target: Se definir esta propriedade para `true`, o cabeçalho será desenhado como habitualmente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cabeçalho deve ser desenhado pelo sistema operativo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text using the default formatting.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do cabeçalho de coluna a utilizar a predefinição de formatação.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando não precisar de personalizar o aspeto do texto do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Draws the column header text, formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do cabeçalho de coluna, formatar com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you do not need to customize the appearance of the header text.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método quando não precisar de personalizar o aspeto do texto do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the header, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valores especificados no `flags` parâmetro permitem-lhe forneça as propriedades de formatação para o cabeçalho, como o alinhamento do texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the column header text.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de letra utilizado para desenhar o texto do cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> representing the font of the header text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> que representa o tipo de letra do texto do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de primeiro plano do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> representing the foreground color of the header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornece métodos útil para desenhar no dispositivo de apresentação e propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the column header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para desenhar no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho de coluna para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade não fornecem informações adequadas para satisfazer as suas necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the mouse is over the column header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade fornece apenas as informações de estado básicos que pode utilizar, por exemplo, para determinar se o rato está sobre o cabeçalho de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewColumnHeaderEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Header property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> representing the header.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de cabeçalho, por outro lado, permite-lhe aceder a todos os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>que representa o cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"></xref> representing the column header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the mouse pointer is over the header or whether the user has clicked the header.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para determinar se o ponteiro do rato está sobre o cabeçalho ou se o utilizador tiver clicado o cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> values for these states are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>Os valores para estes Estados são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do cabeçalho da coluna.
